wikipedia_page.main: Nick Bell (born 17 December 1983) is a founding partner at Attention Capital and former vice president of content at Snap Inc., parent company of Snapchat, where he reported directly to CEO Evan Spiegel. Prior to Snap, Bell was Senior Vice President of Digital at News Corporation.

response: * Nick Bell (Australian entrepreneur), (born 1980), founder of WME, Australian digital agency
* Nick Bell (American football) (born 1968), former American football running back
